price: Allah berfirman, "Jangan takut (mereka tidak akan dapat membunuhmu), maka pergilah kamu berdua dengan membawa ayat-ayat Kami (mukjizat-mukjizat); sesungguhnya Kami bersamamu mendengarkan (apa-apa yang mereka katakan),
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
